languages.text: "О, правда? Так эта парочка ксеносов подле тебя лишь трофеи? И по странной случайности они не имеет совершенно никакого отношения к происходящему на моей планете?"

traits.locale_text: "О, правда? Так эта парочка ксеносов подле тебя лишь трофеи? И по странной случайности они не имеет совершенно никакого отношения к происходящему на моей планете?"

languages.text: "Oh, truly? The pair of xenos next to you are but trophies, then? And by strange coincidence have absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
languages.original_text: "О, правда? Так эта парочка ксеносов подле тебя лишь трофеи? И по странной случайности они не имеет совершенно никакого отношения к происходящему на моей планете?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, truly? The pair of xenos next to you are but trophies, then? And by strange coincidence have absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
"Oh, truly? The pair of xenos next to you are but trophies, then? And by strange coincidence have absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
"Oh, truly? The pair of xenos next to you are but trophies, then? And by strange coincidence have absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
"Oh, truly? The pair of xenos next to you are but trophies, then? And by strange coincidence have absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
"Oh, truly? The pair of xenos next to you are but trophies, then? And by strange coincidence have absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
"Oh, truly? The pair of xenos next to you are but trophies, then? And by strange coincidence have absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"

languages.text: «¿No me diga? ¿Entonces el par de xenos que tiene al lado qué son, trofeos? ¿Y da la casualidad de que no tienen absolutamente nada que ver con lo que ocurre en mi planeta?».
languages.original_text: "Oh, truly? The pair of xenos next to you are but trophies, then? And by strange coincidence have absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"

traits.locale_text: «¿No me diga? ¿Entonces el par de xenos que tiene al lado qué son, trofeos? ¿Y da la casualidad de que no tienen absolutamente nada que ver con lo que ocurre en mi planeta?».

languages.text: “噢，真的吗？你身边那个两个异形只是你的战利品，是吗？这还真巧，莫非他们和我的行星上发生的事情没有任何关系吗？”
languages.original_text: "Oh, truly? The pair of xenos next to you are but trophies, then? And by strange coincidence have absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"

traits.locale_text: “噢，真的吗？你身边那个两个异形只是你的战利品，是吗？这还真巧，莫非他们和我的行星上发生的事情没有任何关系吗？”

languages.text: « Ah, vraiment ? Alors les deux xénos à côté de vous sont des trophées, c'est ça ? Et bien sûr, leur présence n'a absolument rien à voir avec ce qui se passe sur ma planète ? »
languages.original_text: "Oh, truly? The pair of xenos next to you are but trophies, then? And by strange coincidence have absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"

traits.locale_text: « Ah, vraiment ? Alors les deux xénos à côté de vous sont des trophées, c'est ça ? Et bien sûr, leur présence n'a absolument rien à voir avec ce qui se passe sur ma planète ? »

languages.text: 「本当か？お前の隣にいる異種族は戦利品に過ぎないのか？奇妙な偶然の一致であり、俺の惑星で起きた出来事とはまったく関係がないのだな？」
languages.original_text: "Oh, truly? The pair of xenos next to you are but trophies, then? And by strange coincidence have absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"

traits.locale_text: 「本当か？お前の隣にいる異種族は戦利品に過ぎないのか？奇妙な偶然の一致であり、俺の惑星で起きた出来事とはまったく関係がないのだな？」

languages.text: "Oh, wirklich? Die zwei Xenos neben Euch sind also nur Trophäen? Und haben durch einen sonderbaren Zufall überhaupt keine Verbindung zu den Geschehnissen auf meinem Planeten?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, truly? The pair of xenos next to you are but trophies, then? And by strange coincidence have absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, wirklich? Die zwei Xenos neben Euch sind also nur Trophäen? Und haben durch einen sonderbaren Zufall überhaupt keine Verbindung zu den Geschehnissen auf meinem Planeten?"

languages.text: "Gerçekten mi? O hâlde yanındaki zenolar da ganimet, değil mi? Tesadüfün böylesi o zaman. Gezegenimde olan bitenle hiçbir şekilde bağlantıları yok sanıyorum..."
languages.original_text: "Oh, truly? The pair of xenos next to you are but trophies, then? And by strange coincidence have absolutely no connection to the happenings on my planet?"
